3. Aps (Unit: m2)

WB Assessment The monitoring parameter, Unit, and descriptions are as per the registered VCS-PD /05/. Data / Parameter Apy Data unit 2 m Description Area of the single or multiple reservoirs measured in the surface of the water, after the implementation of the project activity, when the reservoir is full Source of data Project site The source of data is in accordance with the registered VCS-PD /05/. Description of measurement methods and procedures to be applied Measured from topographical surveys, maps, Satellite pictures, etc. The measurement method is_ in accordance with the registered VCS- PD /05/. Frequency of monitoring/recording Once at the beginning of each crediting period The frequency of monitoring/recording is in accordance with the registered VCS-PD /05/.
